text: Sally and of course Mrs Septimus, for surely Mr Septimus stood in the same case as myself? But was it so? I allowed myself to entertain for an instant the idea, the strange, the unwelcome, the almost inconceivable idea, that Ariadne's arrival would be inopportune; and with the idea came a somewhat vulgar impulse, which I refused, to watch Mr Septimus more closely, Mrs Caine too and Mr Gilberto who would surely show some anxiety by now if he noticed anything untoward..
handwritten_text: Sally and of course Mrs Septimus, for surely Mr Septimus stood in the same case as myself? But was it so? I allowed myself to entertain for an instant the idea, the strange, the unwelcome, the almost inconceivable idea, that Ariadne's arrival would be inopportune; and with the idea came a somewhat vulgar impulse, which I refused, to watch Mr Septimus more closely, Mrs Caine too and Mr Gilberto who would surely show some anxiety by now if he noticed anything untoward..
